main event: An observer reported sighting a bright light blue object in Oatman, Arizona on November 22, 1966, for about two seconds.
interesting points: The object was observed for only 2 seconds,The observer noted a faint rumbling sound on the radio during the sighting,The object was described as 6 to 7 inches in diameter and perfectly round,It had reddish-orange streaks in the rear ending at a point,The object appeared to travel downward from an easterly direction to a westerly direction at about 20 degrees from vertical.
witness description: a civilian who made notes of the sighting
